title: NO FEE! Gorgeous 2Bed/2Bath overlooking eastern pkwy! Rooftop, Gym
posting_body: ['Welcome to 409 Eastern Parkway Unit 802 located in charming Crown Heights, just steps to Franklyn Ave /Prospect Park!', 'Gross Rent $5,895 (6 Weeks free off 12 month lease**)', 'About the space:', '- State of the art breakfast bar kitchen + Dishwasher', '- 2 Large size bedrooms', '- Spacious living room', '- 2 Gorgeous bathrooms', '- Full-sized in-unit washer/dryer', '- Beautiful hardwood floor', '- Custom Fitness center (complimentary)', '- Stunning rooftop, that offers BBQ areas breathtaking city views', '- Package room', '- Bike storage room', '- Lounge/ Workspace', 'Over 17,000 square feet of amenities!', 'Featuring a state of the art game room with wet bar, a fitness center with yoga alcove next door to Children’s playroom (With glass wall so you can see them play!', 'A pet spa, a rooftop terrace with beautiful skyline views with sunbeds & hammock to lounging and dining areas, grilling stations and Bocce ball court, and a landscaped courtyard connecting the first-floor amenity spaces featuring free Wifi access, library, co-working space and lounge with plush seating and screening areas!', 'This Beautiful 2 Bed 2 Bath is Conveniently Located off Franklin Ave, Home to so many restaurants, bars, cafes, Health Food Stores, Trendy Shops and SO Much More!!!', 'A lovely short walk down Treelined Eastern Pkwy to Botanic Garden, Brooklyn Museum, Grand Army Plaza Greenmarket, and Prospect Park!', 'Union Market coming to the building soon!', 'Just one block away from the 2,3,4 and 5 Trains @ The Franklin Ave Stop', 'For more info or to schedule your exclusive tour, please contact Zjama Realty today!', 'Applicants must have an income of 40x the rent with 700+ credit scores', 'Guarantors and pets OK (case by case).', 'For more info or to schedule a viewing contact Benny today!', 'Cell 646-963-5926', 'Email Benny @zjamarealty .com']
